entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
